info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 2:53PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jefferson and southwestern Wasco Counties through 330 PM PDT... At 253 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southwestern Warm Springs Reservation, or 21 miles east of Detroit, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Western Warm Springs Reservation and Mount Jefferson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
